channel.title: How to place skin
channel.description: this is the look of me, how do i place it as my skin? [img]http://i.imgur.com/CuO0F.png[/img] [url=http://novaskin.me/L3VHb]

item.title: How to place skin
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

and to agl: i believe he’s refering to where u can replace ur basic skin file with this skin to make u look like it, but in multi everyone would look like you as well unless they had a custom skin.

Read full topic

item.title: How to place skin
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:11, topic:429693”][quote author=317guy link=topic=532373.msg3891385#msg3891385 date=1326891605]

well okay, sometimes these things escape my thoughts…

ill post a guide 4 u in like 10mins most likely longer

thanks, ill see which is better unless its just steps for agl’s thing

:l computer turned off so ill just type it

you can either do it by going into minecraft.jar(run - %appdata% - .minecraft - bin - minecraft.jar(open with winrar) - mobs - (call your character file Char and replace it in mobs folder.)
or
Go onto this site called mineshafter(many tutorials)
Best option
:eek: consider buying minecraft :eek:

funny thing is with mineshafter only people with the mod will see it so ummm its a waste

Funny thing is everyone wont look like u :T
[/quote]

ummm your making sense of course no one looks like me i bought minecraft and have a custom skin[/quote]
Well I am 1 of those few people on here that can look like you

Read full topic
